```
0

```

hopelessnessnessnessness
```
> eth.syncing
{
  currentBlock: 4769393,
  highestBlock: 4769560,
  knownStates: 920320,
  pulledStates: 900011,
  startingBlock: 4769362
}
> eth.getBlock("latest").number
0
>
```

your node seems to be syncing. See https://github.com/ethereum/wiki/wiki/JavaScript-API#web3ethsyncing
you should be able to view the balance after sync. Anyway, you can check the balance via https://etherscan.io/address/0xb8e525cf34abaef8b29bbc732a4591eefa1008c2

@thpun I think his point is that the nodes just don't sync at all. If you look at https://ethstats.net/, more or less every single Geth/parity node fails to sync.

In short, no workie.
